title: Busy Status Bar
excerpt: Displays a personal busy message. Built-in Pomodoro timer and Apps. Fully customizable, open-source, and hacker-friendly
text: Busy Status Bar is a productivity multi-tool device with an LED pixel screen. Displays a personal busy message. Built-in Pomodoro timer and Apps. Fully customizable, open-source, and hacker-friendly. Log in to Busy Cloud to control your device via API and MQTT Busy Status Bar is a productivity multi-tool device with an LED pixel screen. Displays a personal busy message. Built-in Pomodoro timer and Apps. Fully customizable, open-source, and hacker-friendly. Busy Status Bar is a productivity multi-tool device with LED pixel screen. Displays personal busy message. Built-in Pomodoro timer and Apps. Fully customizable and open-source, hackers friendly. Cloud-based Python/JavaScript/Go apps > Free JavaScript apps SDK Time management technique based on short intervals of focused work broken by five-minute breaks. > Libs for Python/JavaScript/Go Integration with hourly payment time trackers > Self-hosted cloud provisioning Configure your own focus intervals > Serial COM port over USB > IoT integrations: IFTTT, HomeAssistant > Offline API (no internet required) Built-in apps: clock, weather, social media metrics, currency chart, pixel art wallpapers, and more. Install JavaScript apps from community Remote hosted Python/Javascript/Go apps via API Customizable busy status message to match your own workflow. Set any busy message, expiry timer and activation trigger Upload custom busy graphics or choose from gallery Activate manually from device or remotely from PC, Mobile App or via API Automatic activation by Zoom, Discord, Microsoft Teams, Google Calendar Live Busy status Busy Status Bar can integrate with desktop software and automatically activate when you’re on a call, live on stream, recording audio or when a certain program is active. Automatic “On Call” status When the microphone is activated on the computer, the device will automatically display an “on call” status. When you are streaming through any software like OBS (Open Broadcaster Software), Busy Status Bar will automatically turn on. Supports Windows / macOS / Linux. Manual controls Physical buttons allow to control the device manually without connecting to PC or mobile app. The large buttons are designed for easy use without looking at the device. Start / Pause button Back button Start and stop your status. Also works as an OK button in menu Go back in menu and quit apps Scroll wheel 5-position selector Set timer in Busy and Pomodoro modes, navigate in menu, OK button Pomodoro Time management technique based on short intervals of focused work divided by 5-minute breaks Busy Active busy status message with custom design configurable for your own workflow Apps Clock, weather, social media stats (YouTube, Instagram, TikTok), and more. Supports 3rd-party user applications Settings Wi-Fi / Bluetooth connections, screen brightness, sound volume, power saving mode, etc. Manual controls Physical buttons allow to control the device manually without connecting to PC or mobile app. The large buttons are designed for easy use without looking at the device. Start / Pause button Start and stop your status. Also works as an OK button in menu Back button Back in menu, exit from the application. Pomodoro Time management technique based on short intervals of focused work divided by 5-minute breaks Busy Active busy status message with custom design configurable for your own workflow Scroll wheel Set timeout for Busy and Pomodoro, scroll in the menu, OK button. Apps Clock, weather, social media stats (YouTube, Instagram, TikTok), and more. Supports 3rd-party user applications Settings Wi-Fi / Bluetooth connections, screen brightness, sound volume, power saving mode, etc. Back button Go back in menu and quit apps Scroll wheel Set timer in Busy and Pomodoro modes, navigate in menu, OK button Eye-friendly back screen allows to control the device and see the status displayed on the main screen — even when it's turned away from you. Monochrome back screen Grayscale OLED display 1.54 inch, 160x80 px, adaptive brightness Log in to Busy Cloud to control your device via API and MQTT
html:
Busy Status Bar is a productivity multi-tool device with an LED pixel screen. Displays a personal busy message. Built-in Pomodoro timer and Apps. Fully customizable, open-source, and hacker-friendly.

Log in to Busy Cloud to control your device via API and MQTT

Busy Status Bar is a productivity multi-tool device with an LED pixel screen. Displays a personal busy message. Built-in Pomodoro timer and Apps. Fully customizable, open-source, and hacker-friendly.

Busy Status Bar is a productivity multi-
tool device with LED pixel screen. Displays personal busy message. Built-in Pomodoro timer and Apps. Fully customizable and open-source, hackers friendly.

Cloud-based Python/JavaScript/Go apps

> Free JavaScript apps SDK

Time management technique based on short intervals of focused work broken by five-minute breaks.

> Libs for Python/JavaScript/Go

Integration with hourly payment time trackers

> Self-hosted cloud provisioning

Configure your own focus intervals

> Serial COM port over USB

> IoT integrations: IFTTT, HomeAssistant

> Offline API (no internet required)

Built-in apps: clock, weather, social media metrics, currency chart, pixel art wallpapers, and more.

Install JavaScript apps from community

Remote hosted Python/Javascript/Go apps via API

Customizable busy status message to match your own workflow.

Set any busy message, expiry timer and activation trigger

Upload custom busy graphics or choose from gallery

Activate manually from device or remotely from PC, Mobile App or via API

Automatic activation by Zoom, Discord, Microsoft Teams, Google Calendar

Live Busy status

Busy Status Bar can integrate with desktop software and automatically activate when you’re on a call, live on stream, recording audio or when a certain program is active.

Automatic “On Call” status

When the microphone is activated on the computer, the device will automatically display an “on call” status.

When you are streaming through any software like OBS (Open Broadcaster Software), Busy Status Bar will automatically turn on.

Supports Windows / macOS / Linux.

Manual controls

Physical buttons allow to control the device manually without connecting to PC or mobile app. The large buttons are designed for easy use without looking at the device.

Start / Pause button

Back button

Start and stop your status. Also works as an OK button in menu

Go back in menu and quit apps

Scroll wheel

5-position selector

Set timer in Busy and Pomodoro modes, navigate in menu, OK button

Pomodoro

Time management technique based on short intervals of focused work divided by 5-minute breaks

Busy

Active busy status message with custom design configurable for your own workflow

Apps

Clock, weather, social media stats (YouTube, Instagram, TikTok), and more.
Supports 3rd-party user applications

Settings

Wi-Fi / Bluetooth connections, screen brightness, sound volume, power saving mode, etc.

Manual controls

Physical buttons allow to control the device manually without connecting to PC or mobile app. The large buttons are designed for easy use without looking at the device.

Start / Pause button

Start and stop your status. Also works as an OK button in menu

Back button

Back in menu, exit from the application.

Pomodoro

Time management technique based on short intervals of focused work divided by 5-minute breaks

Busy

Active busy status message with custom design configurable for your own workflow

Scroll wheel

Set timeout for Busy and Pomodoro, scroll in the menu, OK button.

Apps

Clock, weather, social media stats (YouTube, Instagram, TikTok), and more. Supports 3rd-party user applications

Settings

Wi-Fi / Bluetooth connections, screen brightness, sound volume, power saving mode, etc.

Back button

Go back in menu and quit apps

Scroll wheel

Set timer in Busy and Pomodoro modes, navigate in menu, OK button

Eye-friendly back screen allows to control the device and see the status displayed on the main screen — even when it's turned away from you.

Monochrome back screen

Grayscale OLED display

1.54 inch, 160x80 px, adaptive brightness

Log in to Busy Cloud to control your device via API and MQTT
